original_text: Joseph said to his brothers and to his father's household, “I will go up and tell Pharaoh and will say to him, ‘My brothers and my father's household, who were in the land of Canaan, have come to me.
korean_text: 요셉이 그의 형들과 아버지의 가족에게 이르되 내가 올라가서 바로에게 아뢰어 이르기를 가나안 땅에 있던 내 형들과 내 아버지의 가족이 내게로 왔는데

sentences.original_text: I will go up and tell Pharaoh
My brothers and my father's household
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 형들과 나의 아버지의 집안 사람들

sentences.original_text: who were in the land of Canaan
